element.name: Outcome at Hospital Discharge
element.definition: The patient's functional status at time of hospital discharge.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: No significant disability despite symptoms; able to carry out all usual duties and activities

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Slight disability; unable to carry out all previous activities, but able to look after own affairs without assistance

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Moderate disability; requiring some help, but able to walk without assistance

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Moderately severe disability; unable to walk without assistance and unable to attend to own bodily needs without assistance

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Severe disability; bedridden, incontinent and requiring constant nursing care and attention
